feed.title: Track Awesome Tmux Updates Weekly
feed.subtitle: A list of awesome resources for tmux

entry.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Jan 13 - Jan 19, 2025
entry.content:
Plugins

  • tmux-click-copy (⭐4) word/line copy on double/triple click without fixed timeout and without remaining stuck in copy mode
  • tmux-fzf-open-files-nvim (⭐8) - A plugin that parses pane text for files for selection in fzf to open in neovim.

entry.content:

Plugins

entry.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Jul 31 - Aug 06, 2023
entry.content:
Tools and session management

  • tmux-nav-master (⭐6) Easy cross-navigation between tmux and other terminal applications.

Themes

  • tmux-base16-statusline (⭐28) Statusline based on base16-shell (⭐253)
  • tmux-colors-solarized (⭐1.1k) A color theme for the tmux terminal multiplexer using Ethan Schoonover’s Solarized color scheme
  • tmux-dark-notify (⭐67) - Make tmux's theme follow macOS dark/light mode.
  • tmux-power (⭐618) 8 powerline style themes for tmux, easily to expand.
  • tmux-snazzy (⭐18) Elegant tmux theme with bright colors
  • tmux-themepack (⭐1.7k) Various themes for tmux
  • tokyo-night-tmux (⭐455) tokyo-night theme for tmux
  • tomorrow (⭐47): 5 flavors of Tomorrow theme based on specifications from Tomorrow Theme (⭐14k) (i.e. dark/blue and light).

Plugins

  • tmux-keylocker (⭐5) Lock away your tmux keybinds temporarely.
entry.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Jul 31 - Aug 06, 2023

entry.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Jan 18 - Jan 24, 2021
entry.content:
Tutorials

  • Tmux crash course
  • Tmux and Vim together

Configuration

  • Guide to customizing tmux.conf
  • tmux yank to system clipboard A way to get the System Clipboard to work with tmux yank on a Mac via pbcopy and linux via xclip

Tools and session management

  • libtmux (⭐1.1k) Python API for tmux
  • teamocil (⭐2.4k) A simple tool used to automatically create windows and panes in tmux with YAML files
  • tmuxp (⭐4.2k) 💻 tmux session manager and python library

Books / Development and testing

  • tmux 2: Productive Mouse-Free Development
entry.summary: 8 awesome projects updated on Jan 18 - Jan 24, 2021

Plugins

  • tmux-fingers (⭐1.1k) copy pasting in terminal with vimium/vimperator like hints.
entry.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Sep 12 - Sep 18, 2016

entry.title: Awesome Tmux Updates on Apr 04 - Apr 10, 2016
entry.content:
Tutorials

  • Automatically start tmux on SSH
  • Tmux primer

Cheat Sheets

  • tmux-cheatsheet.markdown

Configuration

  • Example tmux config (⭐1.8k) 📗 Example tmux configuration - screen + vim key-bindings, system stat, cpu load bar
  • practical tmux
  • tmux-extra (⭐119) Configuration and scripts for sane Tmux default behavior

Tools and session management

  • powerline (⭐15k) Statusline plugin for vim, and provides statuslines and prompts for several other applications including tmux
  • tmuxifier (⭐1.4k) Tmuxify your Tmux. Powerful session, window & pane management for Tmux.
  • tmuxinator (⭐13k) Manage complex tmux sessions easily

Plugins

  • tmux2html (⭐724) 🐈 Render full tmux windows or individual panes as HTML
  • tmux-plugins Official tmux plugins
    • tmux-continuum (⭐3.6k) Continuous saving of tmux environment. Automatic restore when tmux is started. Automatic tmux start when computer is turned on.
    • tmux-copycat (⭐1.1k) A plugin that enhances tmux search
    • tmux-fpp (⭐321) Quickly open any path on your terminal window in your $EDITOR of choice!
    • tmux-logging (⭐1.1k) Easy logging and screen capturing for Tmux.
    • tmux-open (⭐666) Tmux key bindings for quick opening of a highlighted file or url
    • tmux-pain-control (⭐792) standard pane key-bindings for tmux
    • tmux-resurrect (⭐12k) Persists tmux environment across system restarts.
    • tmux-sessionist (⭐437) Lightweight tmux utils for manipulating sessions
    • tmux-sidebar (⭐573) A sidebar with the directory tree for the current path. Tries to make tmux more IDE like.
    • tmux-tpm (⭐13k) Tmux Plugin Manager
    • tmux-urlview (⭐281) Quickly open any url on your terminal window! (No commits since 2016, see tmux-urlscan or tmux-fzf-url for a maintained alternative.)
    • tmux-yank (⭐2.9k) Tmux plugin for copying to system clipboard. Works on OSX, Linux and Cygwin.

Plugins / Development and testing

  • tmux-example-plugin (⭐47) Example Tmux plugin that actually demonstrates how to build plugins for Tmux
  • tmux-test (⭐16) A small framework for isolated testing of tmux plugins.

Miscellaneous / Development and testing

  • Statically linked tmux Install new version without root access
  • vim-tmux (⭐336) vim plugin for tmux.conf
entry.summary: 15 awesome projects updated on Apr 04 - Apr 10, 2016
